description: Kyle returns a second night and this time Mike has some surprises up his sleeve for the gorgeous hunk. Kyle says he's ready to try something a little different. Mike brags about having given Kyle head and asks him if he's ready to get fucked. Kyle says he ain't so sure about all that. But Mike is a persistent bitch and he'll stop at nothing to push the envelope. I can't believe this guy has such nerve. Can you believe it? Luckily for us Mike doesn't give up on trying to get Kyle to try something new and eventually Mike lays the bullshit on thick enough to convince this slab of muscle to try a dildo. Not just one dildo, but a set of anal beads, too. And Mike gets right in there and offers his assistance, giving him a helping hand! All this has got me all beside myself. I'm gonna go call Mike up right now and tell him what a sleazy pervert he is and just how much I love it.
title: Kyle
